thread.title: COMME des GARÇONS Homme FW17 Collection Channels Military Vibes
thread.title_full: COMME des GARÇONS Homme FW17 Collection Channels Military Vibes

author: Graeme Campbell
title: COMME des GARÇONS Homme FW17 Collection Channels Military Vibes
text:
Visit the original post to see all 16 images from this gallery. 
COMME des GARÇONS’ Homme subdivision makes it mark on FW17 with a collection that channels some heavy military vibes.
Overseen by Junya Wantanabe — lifetime protege of Rei Kawakubo — the menswear range eschews its usual experimentalism in favor of a more casual approach which isn’t too dissimilar to Travis Bickle’s Taxi Driver get-up. Earthy and khaki colorways feature prominently, as do patchwork badges. Key pieces include the tailored tweed blazer, zip-sleeve bomber jacket, and a stripy hoodie with COMME branding writ large.
Keep an eye on this range hitting luxury proprietors like SSENSE in the future.
If you missed it first time around, we peeped what Paris’ fashion glitterati wore to the Paris Men’s Fashion Week show.
